name: Ominos
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40.  The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is." Updated post jam with some graphics improvements, and adjusted difficulty so it's possible to get to the really crazy pieces. 

A familiar puzzle game with a twist. Left-click to place your tiles. Right-Click to rotate. Fill all spaces in a row to clear that line.

Note: You can place your tiles below other tiles if there’s room.

Update: I added a Post Jam build for Windows that makes it easier to get to bigger pieces, and has some new scoring along with other changes. HTML5 is still running the 48 hour version since the game jam voting is still going on.
